name: Ninja Ball (Jessica Wei, An_Insomnia_Song, magicaltoastfairy)
description:
Ninja ball has been trapped and must escape! Bounce, stealth, and roll your way out of this place to retain your honor. 

Verb Prompt Game assignment for GAME 200. Our verbs are: Bounce and Vanish

Movement Controls
WASD: Movement 
Spacebar: Jump
E: Switch States
ESCP: Pause

Credits for the cracked textures are attributed to: 
Cracks Vectors by Vecteezy  and  Different Shapes Vectors by Vecteezy
